analysis: The documents primarily concern modifications, amendments, or delays to existing executive orders, regulations, or procedures. They cover a range of topics including gold export, emergency fund appointments, Canal Zone employment, government agency coordination, budgetary administration, and the care of insane persons. Many of the orders relate to economic or wartime emergencies, granting the President or other officials specific powers to address these situations.
title: Adjustments to Existing Directives During National Emergencies
